name: Paracetamol 500mg
usage: Pain relief and fever reducer. Take 1-2 tablets every 4-6 hours as needed.

name: Amoxicillin 250mg
usage: Antibiotic for bacterial infections. Take as prescribed by doctor, usually 3 times daily.

name: Ibuprofen 400mg
usage: Anti-inflammatory and pain reliever. Take with food, 1 tablet every 6-8 hours.

name: Cough Syrup (Dextromethorphan)
usage: Relief from dry cough. Adults: 10ml every 6-8 hours. Children: Consult doctor.

name: Vitamin D3 1000 IU
usage: Dietary supplement for bone health. Take 1 tablet daily with meal.

name: Omeprazole 20mg
usage: Treats acid reflux and heartburn. Take 1 capsule daily before breakfast.

name: Cetirizine 10mg
usage: Antihistamine for allergies. Take 1 tablet daily, preferably in the evening.

name: Aspirin 75mg
usage: Blood thinner for heart health. Take 1 tablet daily as directed by doctor.

name: Insulin Injection
usage: For diabetes management. Dosage as prescribed by doctor. Refrigerate after opening.

name: Multivitamin Complex
usage: Daily nutritional supplement. Take 1 tablet with breakfast.

name: Antacid Syrup
usage: Relief from acidity and indigestion. Take 10ml after meals or when needed.

name: Metformin 500mg
usage: Type 2 diabetes management. Take with meals as prescribed by doctor.

name: Hydrocortisone Cream 1%
usage: Treats skin inflammation and itching. Apply thin layer to affected area 2-3 times daily.

name: Loratadine 10mg
usage: 24-hour allergy relief. Take 1 tablet once daily.

name: Salbutamol Inhaler
usage: Asthma relief inhaler. Use as needed for breathing difficulty, 1-2 puffs.

name: Calcium + Vitamin D
usage: Bone health supplement. Take 1 tablet twice daily with meals.

name: Antibiotic Ointment
usage: Prevents infection in minor cuts and burns. Apply to affected area 2-3 times daily.

name: Diphenhydramine 25mg
usage: Antihistamine and sleep aid. Take 1-2 capsules at bedtime.

name: Zinc Sulfate 50mg
usage: Immune system support. Take 1 tablet daily with food.

name: Levocetirizine 5mg
usage: Advanced allergy relief. Take 1 tablet once daily in evening.

name: Children's Fever Syrup
usage: Fever and pain relief for children. Dosage based on child's weight. See label.

name: Probiotic Capsules
usage: Gut health support. Take 1 capsule daily on empty stomach.

name: Eye Drops (Lubricating)
usage: Relief for dry eyes. Apply 1-2 drops to each eye as needed.

name: Omega-3 Fish Oil
usage: Heart and brain health supplement. Take 1-2 capsules daily with meals.
